original: intros a b H1 H2. unfold searchXY. rewrite <- Nat.log2_unique with (a:= S b) (b:= sumToN (S a)). - rewrite Nat.log2_up_unique. + assert (0 < sumToN (S a)) by (apply ltBoolTrue in H1; apply H1). apply Nat.sqrt_up_unique. * apply H2. * split. apply sumToN2. apply H2. apply Nat.lt_le_pred. apply H1. + split. apply Nat.lt_1_succ. apply Nat.log2_up_pos. apply H1. - apply Nat.lt_0_succ.
